content:
Add the Einstein Next Best Action Component to the Voice Call Record Page

From Setup, enter Lightning App Builder in the Quick Find box, then select Lightning App Builder.
Next to Voice Call Record Page, click Edit.
Add the Einstein Next Best Action component to the page.
In the Strategy Source field, select Flow Builder.
Choose the right strategy that consumes the intelligence signals.

Get Started with Einstein Next Best Action
General Flow Limits
title: Einstein Next Best Action for Service Cloud
